entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
